类 ViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • mapeditor.ViewController

  • public class ViewController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for View object

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addContinent()
      Handler to add a continent from text box to list view Bounded to: btnAddContinent
      void clearCanvas()
      Clear all nodes on draw_pane
      void delContinent()
      Handler to delete a continent in continent list view Bounded to: btnDelContinent
      void drawCountry(Country country)
      Draw a country on canvas A wrapper method
      void drawLine(Country p1, Country p2)
      Draw line between two counties and set linkage in each adjacent list, add edge to edge list
      void exit()
      Handler for btnExit
      void initialize(View view)
      Initialize the base pane Fills continent list, set mouse listener to add new country, set listener for continent list view
      void openFile()
      Handler for btnOpen
      void save()
      Save current map to file Tests: 1.

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        public void initialize(View view)
        Initialize the base pane Fills continent list, set mouse listener to add new country, set listener for continent list view
        参数:
        view - View object to be initialized

      • delContinent

        public void delContinent()
        Handler to delete a continent in continent list view Bounded to: btnDelContinent

      • addContinent

        public void addContinent()
        Handler to add a continent from text box to list view Bounded to: btnAddContinent

      • drawCountry

        public void drawCountry(Country country)
        Draw a country on canvas A wrapper method
        参数:
        country - Country object

      • drawLine

        public void drawLine(Country p1,
                     Country p2)
        Draw line between two counties and set linkage in each adjacent list, add edge to edge list
        参数:
        p1 - Country 1 to be connected
        p2 - Country 2 to be connected

      • clearCanvas

        public void clearCanvas()
        Clear all nodes on draw_pane

      • openFile

        public void openFile()
        Handler for btnOpen

      • exit

        public void exit()
        Handler for btnExit

      • save

        public void save()
        Save current map to file Tests: 1. Isolated country; 2. Continent not set for any country; 3. Empty map Then: 4. Open file chooser, passes file to Writer class to further validate map configuration, outputs to file if passed
